title.narrative: Ukraine Emergency COVID-19 Response and Vaccination Project

description.narrative: The Program Development Objective is to prevent, detect and respond to the threat posed by COVID-19 and strengthen the national health system for public health preparedness in Ukraine.

condition.narrative: Dated covenant: No later than one (1) month after the Effective Date, the Borrower, through MOH, shall adopt and thereafter carryout the Project in accordance with the Operations Manual.

Dated covenant: Not later than one (1) month after the Effective Date, the Borrower, through MOH, shall enter into an agreementwith NHSU, under terms and conditions approved by the Bank (“NHSU Agreement”), which shall include, NHSU's obligations under Part 2of the Project, including, inter alia, NHSU's obligation to enter into Health Care Provider Agreements with Eligible Health CareProviders for the provision of Project COVID-19 Vaccines to Priority Population Groups under Part 2 of the Project.

Dated covenant: Not later than two (2) months after the Effective Date, the Borrower, through MOH, shall hire one environmental andsocial specialist, with terms of reference, qualifications, and experience acceptable to the Bank.
